name: ChildNode
description: The ChildNode interface contains methods that are particular to Node objects that can have a parent.

members.name: ChildNode.remove()
members.description: Removes this ChildNode from the children list of its parent.

members.name: ChildNode.before()
members.description: Inserts a set of Node or DOMString objects in the children list of this ChildNode's parent, just before this ChildNode. DOMString objects are inserted as equivalent Text nodes.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: A set of Node or DOMString objects to insert.

members.name: ChildNode.after()
members.description: Inserts a set of Node or DOMString objects in the children list of this ChildNode's parent, just after this ChildNode. DOMString objects are inserted as equivalent Text nodes.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: A set of Node or DOMString objects to insert.

members.name: ChildNode.replaceWith()
members.description: Replaces this ChildNode in the children list of its parent with a set of Node or DOMString objects. DOMString objects are inserted as equivalent Text nodes.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: A set of Node or DOMString objects to replace.
